original_text: That is, They which are the children of the flesh, these are not the children of God: but the children of the promise are counted for the seed.
korean_text: 곧 육신의 자녀가 하나님의 자녀가 아니요 오직 약속의 자녀가 씨로 여기심을 받느니라

sentences.original_text: They which are the children of the flesh
these are not the children of God
but the children of the promise
